title: Shelley Elizabeth Lecrone, 61, Saint Peters, Missouri
content:
. 
 
Shelley was a resident of Saint Peters, Missouri at the time of her passing. 
 
Shelley earned her bachelor's degree in nursing. 
 
She is survived by her husband Melvin. 
 
The family is holding a Memorial Visitation on Monday September 14 2015 starting at 1:00PM. There will be a service immediately fallowing at 2
